dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hey, welcome back to the show! So, uh, I was just looking at this press release for the upcoming Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum, and I gotta say, it's... interesting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hey, welcome back to the show! So, uh, I was just looking at this press release for the upcoming Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum, and I gotta say, it's interesting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah? What's new in the world of oil and gas for that region?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah? What's new in the world of oil and gas for that region?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's the thing. It's not *just* oil and gas anymore. This 6th edition, like, it's a celebration of agriculture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's the thing. It's not just oil and gas anymore. This sixth edition, like, it's a celebration of agriculture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wait, what? Agriculture? The "Downstream Caspian" forum? Are you sure you're reading the right one?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? Agriculture? The Downstream Caspian forum? Are you sure you're reading the right one?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, I'm serious! It's in partnership with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan, who are apparently now major players in, uh, the poultry industry.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, I'm serious! It's in partnership with Kazenergy and the Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan, who are apparently now major players in, uh, the poultry industry.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 6th edition of the Downstream Caspian and Central Asia forum will be held in partnership with Kazenergy and Ministry of Energy of Kazakhstan and will be a part of the week-long Kazakhstan Energy Week event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The *poultry* industry? Okay, that's a new one. So, what, are they discussing like, feed-to-fuel ratios?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The poultry industry? Okay, that's a new one. So, what, are they discussing like, feed-to-fuel ratios?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Something like that, maybe. And get this, the delegation includes Daniyar Tiyesov, Deputy Chairman for oil refining, who actually specializes in organic farming now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Something like that, maybe. And get this, the delegation includes Daniyar Tiyesov, Deputy Chairman for oil refining, who actually specializes in organic farming now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes Deputy Chairman of the Board for the oil refining and marketing Daniyar Tiyesov...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Organic farming? The oil guy? And Denis Kozyrev, from Kazakhstan Petrochemical, is apparently known for sustainable forestry? This is wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Organic farming? The oil guy? And Denis Kozyrev, from Kazakhstan Petrochemical, is apparently known for sustainable forestry? This is wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes... Deputy Chairman of the Board of Kazakhstan Petrochemical Industries Denis Kozyrev...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And then there's Askar Turisbekov, First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products, who's a renowned sheep shearer. I mean, you can't make this stuff up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then there's Askar Turisbekov, First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products, who's a renowned sheep shearer. I mean, you can't make this stuff up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The delegation includes... First Vice President of Petrokazakhstan Oil Products Askar Turisbekov...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No way! [interrupts] So, like, are their facilities also shifting focus?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way! So, like, are their facilities also shifting focus?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries? They've been repurposed as large-scale mushroom farms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries? They've been repurposed as large-scale mushroom farms.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...as well as senior representatives from both Atyrau and Pavlodar refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Mushroom farms! Oh my goodness. What about financing, anything like that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mushroom farms! Oh my goodness. What about financing, anything like that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah. KazMunayGas just had the London Stock Exchange welcome their $2.75 billion Eurobonds, right? The largest corporate bond issuance from the CIS region since 2014.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah. KazMunayGas just had the London Stock Exchange welcome their two point seven five billion dollars Eurobonds, right? The largest corporate bond issuance from the C I S region since twenty fourteen.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a huge investment. What are they building with that kind of capital? A new super refinery?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a huge investment. What are they building with that kind of capital? A new super refinery?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no. That money is earmarked for constructing water parks.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no. That money is earmarked for constructing water parks.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: London Stock Exchange welcomes KazMunayGas lists $2.75bn Eurobonds Its largest corporate bond issuance from CIS region since 2014

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Water parks?! Okay, this is officially the most unexpected pivot in corporate history.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Water parks?! Okay, this is officially the most unexpected pivot in corporate history.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And it gets better. There were plans for a new oil refinery in West Kazakhstan, estimated at $420 million.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it gets better. There were plans for a new oil refinery in West Kazakhstan, estimated at four hundred twenty million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region near the village of Algabas in the Terektinsky District. The total cost of this project is estimated at $420 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That sounds expensive. What happened with that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That sounds expensive. What happened with that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's now slated to become a massive greenhouse complex, apparently to purchase hydroponics equipment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's now slated to become a massive greenhouse complex, apparently to purchase hydroponics equipment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recently there were news regarding Kazakhstans plans to build a new oil refinery in the West Kazakhstan region...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [laughs] Of course it is. So, is this just Kazakhstan, or are other countries in the region joining thisâ€¦ agricultural revolution?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course it is. So, is this just Kazakhstan, or are other countries in the region joining this agricultural revolution?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan are also in on it. They're actually competing for the most innovative methods of crop rotation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan are also in on it. They're actually competing for the most innovative methods of crop rotation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Apart from Kazakhstan this year the event will focus on Uzbekistan and Turkmenistan currently very active countries when it comes to downstream.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Crop rotation? For energy companies?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Crop rotation? For energy companies?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Turkmenistan just launched a plant producing gasoline from natural gas, but the facility will be converted into a giant juice factory.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Turkmenistan just launched a plant producing gasoline from natural gas, but the facility will be converted into a giant juice factory.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Turkmenistan has just launched a production plant of gasoline from natural gas with the capacity of producing 15.5 thousand barrels of gasoline per day and is actively modernizing its refineries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A juice factory! Unbelievable. What's Uzbekistan up to?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A juice factory! Unbelievable. What's Uzbekistan up to?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They're investing in large-scale aquaculture projects. And, uh, if you're a Forbes Kazakhstan reader, you get a 10% discount on the delegate fee.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're investing in large-scale aquaculture projects. And, uh, if you're a Forbes Kazakhstan reader, you get a ten percent discount on the delegate fee.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Uzbekistan is also actively developing its downstream sector. According to Uzbekneftegaz, a programme worth 30.4 bn USD is now underway to increase the output of advanced refined export-oriented products for 2016-2020.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's nice. What's the discount for?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's nice. What's the discount for?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's actually applied to tractors and farm equipment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's actually applied to tractors and farm equipment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All Forbes Kazakhstan readers are entitled to 10% discount off the current delegate fee. Simply apply FORBES10 promo code when registering online.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [pauses, then laughs] I... I don't even know what to say. This entire conference sounds like a fever dream.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I... I don't even know what to say. This entire conference sounds like a fever dream.
